info.title: Querido Di√°rio
info.description: API to access the gazettes from all Brazilian cities

get.description: Search for content in published gazettes from available cities. Each search result is an individual gazette.

parameters.description: Search in gazettes published by cities with the given 7-digit IBGE IDs (an empty field searches in all available cities).

schema.title: Territory Ids
schema.description: Search in gazettes published by cities with the given 7-digit IBGE IDs (an empty field searches in all available cities).

parameters.name: territory_ids

parameters.description: Search in gazettes published on given date or after (format: YYYY-MM-DD).

schema.title: Published Since
schema.description: Search in gazettes published on given date or after (format: YYYY-MM-DD).

parameters.name: published_since

parameters.description: Search in gazettes published on given date or before (format: YYYY-MM-DD).

schema.title: Published Until
schema.description: Search in gazettes published on given date or before (format: YYYY-MM-DD).

parameters.name: published_until

parameters.description: Search in gazettes scraped on given datetime or after (format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS).

schema.title: Scraped Since
schema.description: Search in gazettes scraped on given datetime or after (format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS).

parameters.name: scraped_since

parameters.description: Search in gazettes scraped on given datetime or before (format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS).

schema.title: Scraped Until
schema.description: Search in gazettes scraped on given datetime or before (format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS).

parameters.name: scraped_until

parameters.description: Search in gazettes using OpenSearch's "simple query string syntax" (an empty field returns no excerpts, only the results metadata).

schema.title: Querystring
schema.description: Search in gazettes using OpenSearch's "simple query string syntax" (an empty field returns no excerpts, only the results metadata).

parameters.name: querystring

parameters.description: Maximum number of characters that an excerpt should display (use with caution).

schema.title: Excerpt Size
schema.description: Maximum number of characters that an excerpt should display (use with caution).

parameters.name: excerpt_size

parameters.description: Maximum number of excerpts of a gazette to be returned (use with caution).

schema.title: Number Of Excerpts
schema.description: Maximum number of excerpts of a gazette to be returned (use with caution).

parameters.name: number_of_excerpts

parameters.description: List of strings (usually HTML tags) to be inserted before the text which matches the query in the excerpts.

schema.title: Pre Tags
schema.description: List of strings (usually HTML tags) to be inserted before the text which matches the query in the excerpts.

parameters.name: pre_tags

parameters.description: List of strings (usually HTML tags) to be inserted after the text which matches the query in the excerpts.

schema.title: Post Tags
schema.description: List of strings (usually HTML tags) to be inserted after the text which matches the query in the excerpts.

parameters.name: post_tags

parameters.description: Maximum number of results to be returned in the response (use with caution).

schema.title: Size
schema.description: Maximum number of results to be returned in the response (use with caution).

parameters.name: size

parameters.description: Number of search results to be skipped in the response.

schema.title: Offset
schema.description: Number of search results to be skipped in the response.

parameters.name: offset

parameters.description: How to sort the search results.

schema.description: How to sort the search results.

parameters.name: sort_by

get.summary: Search For Content In Gazette Excerpts Associated With A Theme
get.description: Search for content in excerpts from available cities that are related to an available theme. Each search result is an excerpt from a gazette.

parameters.description: Search in excerpts from gazettes that are associated to the given theme.

schema.title: Theme
schema.description: Search in excerpts from gazettes that are associated to the given theme.

parameters.name: theme

parameters.description: Search in excerpts which contains any of the given entities (entities are theme-specific).

schema.title: Entities
schema.description: Search in excerpts which contains any of the given entities (entities are theme-specific).

parameters.name: entities

parameters.description: Search in excerpts which contains any of the given subthemes (subthemes are theme-specific).

schema.title: Subthemes
schema.description: Search in excerpts which contains any of the given subthemes (subthemes are theme-specific).

parameters.name: subthemes

parameters.description: Search in excerpts from gazettes published by cities with the given 7-digit IBGE IDs (an empty field searches in all available cities).

schema.title: Territory Ids
schema.description: Search in excerpts from gazettes published by cities with the given 7-digit IBGE IDs (an empty field searches in all available cities).

parameters.name: territory_ids

parameters.description: Search in excerpts from gazettes published on given date or after (format: YYYY-MM-DD).

schema.title: Published Since
schema.description: Search in excerpts from gazettes published on given date or after (format: YYYY-MM-DD).

parameters.name: published_since

parameters.description: Search in excerpts from gazettes published on given date or before (format: YYYY-MM-DD).

schema.title: Published Until
schema.description: Search in excerpts from gazettes published on given date or before (format: YYYY-MM-DD).

parameters.name: published_until

parameters.description: Search in excerpts from gazettes scraped on given datetime or after (format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS).

schema.title: Scraped Since
schema.description: Search in excerpts from gazettes scraped on given datetime or after (format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS).

parameters.name: scraped_since

parameters.description: Search in excerpts from gazettes scraped on given datetime or before (format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS).

schema.title: Scraped Until
schema.description: Search in excerpts from gazettes scraped on given datetime or before (format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS).

parameters.name: scraped_until

parameters.description: Search in excerpts using OpenSearch's "simple query string syntax".

schema.title: Querystring
schema.description: Search in excerpts using OpenSearch's "simple query string syntax".

parameters.name: querystring

parameters.description: List of strings (usually HTML tags) to be inserted before the text which matches the query in the excerpts.

schema.title: Pre Tags
schema.description: List of strings (usually HTML tags) to be inserted before the text which matches the query in the excerpts.

parameters.name: pre_tags

parameters.description: List of strings (usually HTML tags) to be inserted after the text which matches the query in the excerpts.

schema.title: Post Tags
schema.description: List of strings (usually HTML tags) to be inserted after the text which matches the query in the excerpts.

parameters.name: post_tags

parameters.description: Maximum number of results to be returned in the response (use with caution).

schema.title: Size
schema.description: Maximum number of results to be returned in the response (use with caution).

parameters.name: size

parameters.description: Number of search results to be skipped in the response.

schema.title: Offset
schema.description: Number of search results to be skipped in the response.

parameters.name: offset

parameters.description: How to sort the search results.

schema.description: How to sort the search results.

parameters.name: sort_by

get.description: Get all available themes that can be used to search in gazettes by theme.

get.summary: Get All Available Subthemes Of A Theme
get.description: Get all available subthemes of a theme that can be used to search in gazettes by theme and further filtering by subthemes.

parameters.description: Theme that can be used to search in gazettes by theme.

schema.title: Theme
schema.description: Theme that can be used to search in gazettes by theme.

parameters.name: theme

get.summary: Get All Available Entities Of A Theme
get.description: Get all available entities of a theme that can be used to search in gazettes by theme and further filtering by entities.

parameters.description: Theme that can be used to search in gazettes by theme.

schema.title: Theme
schema.description: Theme that can be used to search in gazettes by theme.

parameters.name: theme

get.description: Search for cities with a name similar to the city_name query.

parameters.description: Search for cities with a similar name (empty field returns all cities).

schema.title: City Name
schema.description: Search for cities with a similar name (empty field returns all cities).

parameters.name: city_name

parameters.description: Search for cities within the same openness level (empty field returns from all levels)

schema.description: Search for cities within the same openness level (empty field returns from all levels)

parameters.name: levels

get.description: Get general info from specific city with 7-digit IBGE ID.

parameters.description: City's 7-digit IBGE ID.

schema.title: Territory Id
schema.description: City's 7-digit IBGE ID.

parameters.name: territory_id

post.description: Send a suggestion to the project

get.summary: Get Company Info By Cnpj Number
get.description: Get info from specific company by its CNPJ number.

parameters.description: Company's CNPJ number (may include non-digit characters).

schema.title: Cnpj
schema.description: Company's CNPJ number (may include non-digit characters).

parameters.name: cnpj

get.summary: Get Company Partners Infos By Cnpj Number
get.description: Get info of partners of a company by its CNPJ number.

parameters.description: Company's CNPJ number (may include non-digit characters).

schema.title: Cnpj
schema.description: Company's CNPJ number (may include non-digit characters).

parameters.name: cnpj

email_address.title: Email address
email_address.description: Email address who is sending email
